name: D.I.C.E.
description:
You have 6 seconds to live and the enemies are closing in.
Your task is to destroy the incoming crappy enemies and by doing so the dice is cast to give you a slight amount of seconds more to live.

Survive  through the asteroid field to get to the enemy forces and the final boss.

PS: Since the game relies heavily on randomization, it is possible that you don't have enough life time to cross the void after the asteroid field to get to the enemy waves,

As a workaround try to keep the white dicey asteroids alive since they spawn back to the top after falling through so that way you have some asteroids left to destroy to leech precious few seconds to pass the void.

Enemy crafts start to come around after 60 seconds and the Boss will come around 80 seconds time.

Happy hunting. <3

Very early prototype of a nice little game for GMTK Gamejam 2022.
